name: Castle Siege (itch)
description:
You may need to zoom out the page to see all the game scene.

Play as a knight that must save the Princess from the Dragon, destroying whatever comes his way in this block-breaker style of game.
This game has 3 levels designed by different people, the credits of each level can be found in the game.

------

Other Credits (from my scenes):
Music from level 2: The Coming by Brandan Paulin
Music from level selection and how to play: Epic Cinematic Ethnic Flute by Alabafruit from looperman.com
Music from Win scene: Divining by gokenshadow http://www.flashkit.com/loops/Easy_Listening/Classical/divining-150121113006.htm...
Level 2: Anvil Impact 1x Sound by Stephan Schutze http://soundbible.com/1742-Anvil-Impact-1x.html
Level 2 Sound of block breaking:Smashing Sound by Yuri Santana http://soundbible.com/1945-Smashing.html
Level 2 Minion Breaking : Pterodactyl Scream Sound by Mike Koenig http://soundbible.com/1497-Pterodactyl-Scream.html

Font used: President by mediabuilder.com
